backend/main.mo: Defines core actor types and logic for users, tasks, avatars, audit logs, overtime entries, and sorting utilities, using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific onboarding-copy update to the affected frontend file and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their responsibilities such as routing, dashboards, forms, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and applying base background and text rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that mounts the React app and includes a rebuild trigger comment.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Timestamped marker file indicating current build version and rebuild time.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, profile setup flow, role‑based dashboard routing, and error boundary wrapping.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/AssistantDetailV: Manager‑side detailed assistant view showing overtime data, charts, task habits, and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/components/AssistantList.ts: Displays a selectable scrollable list of assistants with avatars and overtime totals, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/DangerZone.tsx: Provides a UI section for wiping all stored data, including a confirmation dialog and mutation to clear storage and reset the app.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, user profile controls, avatar modal, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ManagerAnalytics: Displays overtime analytics for assistants, including summary rows and bar charts using fetched overtime totals.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeChart.ts: Generates cumulative overtime charts (line or bar) by grouping and processing overtime entries.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeForm.tsx: Form for adding or using overtime with validation, submission handling, and input reset logic.
Shows paginated overtime history with search, formatting, and edit support for the latest entry.
Displays overtime totals with loading skeletons and shows days, hours, and minutes with UI cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/profile/AvatarMo: Modal for changing user avatars, supporting image upload and preset selection with validation and profile updates.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Renders a user avatar from a profile picture, preset image, or initials, loading blob URLs when needed.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Profile dialog allowing users to view and edit their initials and see role and avatar info using profile queries.
frontend/src/components/todo/AuditLogVie: Displays and filters the audit log of task actions with search, action filtering, and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/todo/EvidenceIma: Dialog that shows a large preview of an evidence image for a task with a close button.
frontend/src/components/todo/MarkTaskDon: Dialog for marking a task as done, supporting comments and optional photo upload before submission.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskComplet: Shows who completed a task by displaying their avatar and initials or username.
Lets users upload or capture a photo for task completion, validating images and generating previews.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskLedgerD: Displays a task’s audit history with timestamps, actions, and optional evidence photo previews.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskPrefere: Manages assistants’ task preferences, fetching data and allowing updates per task.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoSection: Main to‑do section handling task CRUD, search, pinning, and marking tasks done.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTable.t: Renders the task list with frequency indicators, actions, history access, and evidence photo previews.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTaskDia: React dialog for creating, editing, and deleting to-do tasks with form validation and frequency selection.
frontend/src/constants/dentalPresets.ts: Defines 24 dental-themed preset avatars and a helper to fetch preset info by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, avatars, tasks, overtime, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Hook for reading, applying, and toggling light, dark, or system theme with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light and dark theme variables for a warm dental-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Renders the assistant dashboard with tabs for to-do items and overtime management, including forms, summaries, history, and charts.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login screen using Internet Identity authentication with loading feedback and branding elements.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Provides manager views for tasks, team management, analytics, audit logs, and settings with assistant selection and deletion handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Shows a profile creation form for username, initials, and language, with validation and registration logic.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlobUrl.ts: Retrieves a usable URL for an ExternalBlob, preferring a direct URL and falling back to creating an object URL from bytes.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeDates.ts: Utility functions for formatting overtime dates, getting today's local date, and checking for future dates.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeStyles.ts: Returns a CSS class name indicating whether an overtime entry is an addition or usage.
frontend/src/utils/photoValidation.ts: Validates image files by checking allowed types and enforcing a 6MB size limit.
frontend/src/utils/presetTileColors.ts: Generates deterministic accent and hover colors for avatar tiles based on a preset ID.
frontend/src/utils/taskHabits.ts: Provides helpers for computing task completion metrics, formatting completion history, timestamps, and preference labels/colors.
frontend/src/utils/todoDates.ts: Provides utilities for computing task due dates, formatting due date text, and calculating urgency scores based on frequency and timing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, animations, and loading Tailwind plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state and pending feature requests focused on enforcing role defaults, making user 'Jay' a permanent Manager, and assigning new users as Assistants.
